column7: New mixed-use building of 27 storeys. The podium will become the new location of the grocery store which currently exists on the property and the residential tower above will include 391 condominium units.

Proposal includes a 10-12 storey residential building fronting onto Lawrence Avenue, with series of 2/3 storey townhomes fronting an interior pedestrian access, with vehicular laneway access in the rear accessed via Ellington Drive. Proposed total FSI of 1.83, with proposed total GFA of 9,611.05 sq.m. Approximately 121-134 residential units are proposed.

The proposed development for the subject lands contemplates an three mixed use towers ranging

in height from 25 to 55 stories (87 to 177 metres), a total Gross Floor Area (`GFA¿) of 117,913

square metres (113,104 square metres of residential GFA and 4810 square metres of commercial

space), and a proposed density of 6.42 times the lot area. A total of 1466 vehicular parking spaces

and 1087 bicycle parking spaces.
Construction of an 8-storey residential building with 10,291 square metres of residential gross floor area to the subject site, which is currently occupied by a 16-storey rental apartment building.
